name: The Legend of Zelda - Custom Dungeon
name_original: The Legend of Zelda - Custom Dungeon
description:
This is a custom dungeon for The Legend of Zelda made with 2 new mechanics.

First new mechanic is take flight which is dropped by killing Keese(bat enemies) and allows Link to fly over obstacles for a short period of time.

Second mechanic is speed boost which is dropped by Gel enemies and allows Link to move a lot faster than usual.

Their effects can be combined by using them in quick succession.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys - Movement

1 - Enable cheat mode for infinite consumables. all unlocks and HP.

2 - Bomb

3 - Bow

5 - Take Flight

6 - Speed Boost

Z - Use equipped item

X - Use sword

R- Restart level
